exp_guide1_desc: This book will guide you on your journey to the stars.
exp_guide1_oxygen_body: There is no oxygen in space. You will need a portable source of oxygen to survive there. The §3§lSpace§r §3§lEquipment§r provides oxygen in such harsh environments.
exp_guide1_temperature_body: Some planets have an extreme climate. You'll have to upgrade your Space Equipment with §3§lmodules§r to protect yourself against the extreme temperatures.
exp_guide1_fabricator_craft:
§oCrafting:
Throw 15 steel ingots,
5 copper ingots,
2 diamonds,
and a crafting table
on the ground.

Alternatively:
exp_guide1_rocket_craft:
§oCrafting:
Place the Rocket Parts
on top of each other
like blocks.
exp_guide1_oredesc_titanium:
§o
Found far below the surface of The Moon.
exp_guide1_oredesc_amethyst:
§o
Found in the Mushroom Crystal Caves.
exp_guide1_oredesc_vulcanium:
§o
Found as spikes in very hot caves.
exp_armor_equipment_tip2: §b- Provides oxygen in space when equipped and filled.
exp_armor_equipment_tip3: §b- Use a full oxygen tank to fill.
exp_armor_equipment_tip4: §b- Sneak and look up or down to control the jetpack.
exp_armor_equipment_tip5: §b- Doublesneak and look up or down to boost the jetpack.
exp_blocks_arcfurnace_tip1: §b- Refines two different materials into an alloy.
exp_blocks_compressor_tip1: §b- Put an empty oxygen tank into the slot to fill it.
exp_blocks_enhancer_tip1: §b- Applies modules to your Space Equipment.
exp_blocks_extractor_tip2: §b- Place crying obsidian in the slot above the extractor.
exp_blocks_planetarium_tip1: §b- Displays the positions of the planets in space.
exp_blocks_planetarium_tip2: §b- Use while inside the spaceship in space to activate.
exp_blocks_planetarium_tip3: §b- Can be placed down for decoration.
exp_blocks_terraformer_tip1: §b- Provides oxygen in a very large radius.
exp_blocks_extractor_guitip1: Place crying obsidian on top of the block.
exp_blocks_extractor_guitip2: Wait for the extraction to finish.
exp_blocks_extractor_guitip3: Lacrymae will appear in the slot above.
exp_blocks_oxygenator_guitip3: Your base has to be airtight.
exp_blocks_oxygenator_guitip4: All solid blocks count as airtight.
exp_modules_all_tip1: §b§nCombine with the Space Equipment in the Enhancer.
exp_modules_cooling_tip2: §b- Keeps you cool in extremely hot environments.
exp_modules_mobility_tip2: §b- Allows you to jump higher and run faster.
exp_modules_warming_tip2: §b- Keeps you warm in extremely cold environments.
exp_fuel_lacrymae_tip1: §b- This is spaceship fuel, don't drink it...
exp_fuel_lacrymae_tip2: §b- It has a weird otherworldly smell.
exp_tools_cryoblaster_tip5: §b- Can be used to build in space.
exp_tools_fleetfinder_tip1: §b- Rightclick to locate the Jupiter Fleet.
exp_tools_oxygentank_tip1: §b- Rightclick to refill your Space Equipment.
exp_tools_oxygentank_tip2: §b- Put this into a Compressor to fill it.
exp_tools_pocketspace_tip1: §b- Rightclick to enter/leave the pocket space.
exp_tools_pocketspace_tip3: §b- Use an unassigned pocket space inside a pocket space
exp_tools_pocketspace_tip4: §b  to assign it to that pocket space.
exp_tools_wrench_tip1: §b- Sneak+Rightclick a vehicle to demount it.
exp_vehicles_buggy_tip2: §b- The buggy runs on solar power.
exp_vehicles_buggy_tip3: §b- Adjust the speed by selecting different hotbar slots.
exp_vehicles_lunarmodule_tip2: §b- Enter and click the button to launch.
exp_vehicles_modulebottom_tip1: §b- Recycle it by putting it into the High-Tech Workbench.
exp_vehicles_moduletop_tip1: §b- Recycle it by putting it into the High-Tech Workbench.
exp_vehicles_capsule_tip2: §b- Recycle it by putting it into the High-Tech Workbench.
exp_vehicles_rocket_tip2: §b- Enter the rocket to launch or fuel.
exp_vehicles_rocket_tip3: §b- Rightclick the red dot to enter.
exp_vehicles_spaceship_tip1: §b- Rightclick the placed spaceship to enter or fuel.
exp_vehicles_spaceship_tip3: §b- Rightclick while inside the spaceship to fire the Blasters.
exp_vehicles_spaceship_tip4: §b- Hold Sneak in space to enter Pulse Speed.
exp_vehicles_combine_skin: §bCombine with a spaceship in the enhancer to apply the skin.
exp_weapons_railgun_tip1: §b- Shoots a high-velocity piercing projectile over a long range.
exp_items_core_tip: §b- Insert into a portal to make a Portal Code.
exp_screentxt_nofuel_subtitle: Hold 16 Blaze Powder and try again
exp_screentxt_loaderror_chat: The Expansion was not installed correctly, the custom dimensions didn't load. Try rejoining or restarting your world and make sure that you are not playing on an incompatible server jar.
exp_screentxt_marsnuke_subtitle: Run, run as fast as you can!
exp_advancement_allplanet_desc: Visit all planets and moons in the solar system.
exp_advancement_earthcrash_desc: Gently return to Earth with a Return capsule.
exp_advancement_europa_desc: Go to Europa, there is something hidden deep beneath the surface...
exp_advancement_getguide_desc: Look at The Moon with a spyglass and a Book and Quill in your offhand.
exp_advancement_getplanetarium_desc: Buy the Planetarium from San Holo
exp_advancement_getrocket_desc: Craft a Rocket in the High-Tech Workbench.
exp_advancement_getsteel_desc: Create Steel by combining raw iron and coal in the Arc Furnace.
exp_advancement_jupiterstation_desc: Locate the Jupiter Fleet using a fleet Finder.
exp_advancement_jupiter_desc: Enter Jupiter, the largest planet in the Solar System.
exp_advancement_lacrymae_desc: Obtain Lacrymae from a Lacrymae Extractor.
exp_advancement_mfalconloot_desc: Find all hidden chests in the Millennium Falcon.
exp_advancement_mars_desc: Go to Mars and behold the endless red desert.
exp_advancement_mercury_desc: Visit Mercury, be careful not to burn your feet.
exp_advancement_mfalcon_desc: Find the Millennium Falcon, why is it on the Moon?
exp_advancement_ehorizon_title: Best Pilot I Have Ever Seen
exp_advancement_ehorizon_desc: Find the 'landing' site of San Holo's white and blue ship.
exp_advancement_moon_title: One Small Step For A Man...
exp_advancement_moon_desc: Succesfully land on The Moon, congratulations!
exp_advancement_pocketspace_desc: Enter your own personal pocket space.
exp_advancement_root_desc: Are you ready to expand Minecraft beyond the atmosphere of the Earth?
exp_advancement_space_desc: Reach the realm of Space, far beyond the atmosphere.
exp_advancement_venus_desc: Enter the thick and hazardous atmosphere of Venus.
exp_advancement_special_thanks_root_desc: To all those who helped me make The Expansion.
